channel.title: Postgresql on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Postgresql on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes

item.title: Updating CloudNativePG's documentation
item.description: Meet the mentee: Anushka Saxena worked with the project maintainers on transforming the documentation for CloudNativePG, as part of the LFX mentorship program.

item.title: Chaos testing the CloudNativePG project
item.description: Meet the mentee: Yash Agarwal worked with the project maintainers on adding chaos testing to CloudNativePG, as part of the LFX mentorship program.

item.title: Sticking with Open Source: pgEdge and CloudNativePG
item.description: We talked to Matthew Mols, Sr. Director of Engineering at pgEdge, about how CloudNativePG enables them to meet the requirements of their customers using just open source.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.28.0 Released!
item.description: CloudNativePG 1.28 is here! This stable release promotes Quorum-Based Failover and introduces Declarative Foreign Data Management for FDWs and foreign servers via the Database CRD. We also announce maintenance releases 1.27.2 and the final 1.26.3. Upgrade today for enhanced stability, security, and networking resilience.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.28.0 RC2 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is excited to announce the second release candidate of CloudNativePG 1.28! Join us in testing these updates to shape the final release.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.28.0 RC1 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is excited to announce the first release candidate of CloudNativePG 1.28! This preview promotes quorum-based failover to a stable feature and introduces declarative management for Foreign Data Wrappers. Join us in testing these updates to shape the final release.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.27.1, 1.26.2 and 1.25.4 released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released new updates for the 1.27, 1.26 and 1.25 versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Gabriele Quaresima
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Gabriele Quaresima, Staff Software Engineer at EDB, where he builds products on top of CloudNativePG.

item.title: Customizing the docker build bake hcl file
item.description: Jonathan Gonzalez wrote a guide on this blog detailing how to customize Docker images by using an override hcl file. I tried it for a spin.

item.title: Unlocking full Kubernetes functionality at Brella with CloudNativePG and Hetzner
item.description: We talked to Vito Botta, Lead Platform Architect for the event management platform Brella, about how CloudNativePG fits in their technology stack.

item.title: Beyond the Patch: Continuing our LFX Mentorship
item.description: This summer marked our first time joining the CNCF’s LFX mentorship program—and it was such a great experience that we couldn’t wait to share it with you.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.27.0 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is excited to announce version 1.27.0, featuring powerful new capabilities for PostgreSQL on Kubernetes.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Niccolò Fei
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Niccolò Fei, Kubernetes Administrator and Automation Engineer at EDB.

item.title: CloudNativePG part of LFX Mentorship again - sign up as a mentee!
item.description: We have proposed 3 projects for the September cohort of the CNCF’s LFX Mentorship program, and we’re looking for mentees to sign up and receive a stipend for their work.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.27.0 RC1 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is excited to announce the first release candidate of CloudNativePG 1.27! This preview introduces features like the dynamic loading of PostgreSQL extensions, and the automatic synchronization of logical decoding slots across high-availability clusters. Join us in testing these updates to shape the final release.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.26.1 and 1.25.3 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released new updates for the 1.26 and 1.25 versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: Creating a custom container image for CloudNativePG v2.0
item.description: Using Docker’s Bake to create container images for the CloudNativePG Operator v2.0.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Jaime Silvela
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Jaime Silvela, experienced software developer and system builder and CloudNativePG component owner.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Ying Zhu
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Ying Zhu, student at Carnegie Mellon University, and CNCF mentee.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Floor Drees
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Floor Drees, EDB Principal Program Manager, open source advocate, and newly minted CloudNativePG component owner.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Marco Nenciarini
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Marco Nenciarini, one of the original creators of CloudNativePG.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Jonathan Battiato
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Jonathan Battiato, who sums up his contributions to the project as: ‘I help’.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: David Wheeler
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet David Wheeler, Principal Architect at Tembo, and PGXN maintainer.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.26.0 and 1.25.2 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is excited to announce version 1.26.0, featuring powerful new capabilities for PostgreSQL on Kubernetes, alongside the maintenance release 1.25.2. This release also includes 1.24.4, the final patch for the now-retired 1.24.x series.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Francesco Canovai
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Francesco Canovai, Senior Software Development Engineer at EDB, and CloudNativePG maintainer.

item.title: CloudNativePG part of LFX Mentorship - sign up as a mentee!
item.description: We have proposed a project for the June cohort of the CNCF’s LFX Mentorship program, and we’re looking for mentees to sign up and receive a stipend for their work.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.26.0 RC3 Released!
item.description: CloudNativePG 1.26.0 RC3 is out, featuring key fixes for major upgrades and Barman Cloud plugin migration—test it now and help shape the final release!

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Jeff Mealo
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Jeff Mealo, Senior Software Engineer at Gisual.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Philippe Scorsolini
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Philippe Scorsolini, Staff Software Engineer and Tech Lead at Upbound, and CloudNativePG maintainer.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Daniel Chambre
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Daniel Chambre (aka smiyc), a DBA at WienIT.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Jonathan Gonzalez
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Jonathan Gonzalez, Senior Kubernetes Developer at EDB and CloudNativePG maintainer.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.26.0 RC2 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is excited to announce the second release candidate of CloudNativePG 1.26! This version fixes a few issues in the major upgrade process as well as in the integration of volume snapshot recovery with WALs via plugin. Join us in testing these updates to shape the final release.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Itay Grudev
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. First up is Itay Grudev, component owner for the Operator chart and PostgreSQL Cluster Chart and the Grafana Dashboard for CloudNativePG.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.26.0 RC1 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is excited to announce the first release candidate of CloudNativePG 1.26! This preview introduces features like declarative offline in-place major upgrades of PostgreSQL, startup and readiness probes for replicas, declarative management of extensions and schemas, and more. Join us in testing these updates to shape the final release.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.25.1 and 1.24.3 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released new updates for the 1.25 and 1.24 versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.25.0 and 1.24.2 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is thrilled to unveil the release of version 1.25.0, packed with exciting new features, along with the maintenance update 1.24.2 for the 1.24.x series.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.25.0 RC1 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community is excited to announce the first release candidate of CloudNativePG 1.25! This preview introduces features like declarative databases, logical replication publications and subscriptions, enhanced control over data durability in synchronous replication, and more. Join us in testing these updates to shape the final release.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.24.1 and 1.23.5 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released new updates for the 1.24 and 1.23 versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.24.0 and 1.23.4 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released the new 1.24 minor version and a new update for the supported 1.23 version of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.24.0 RC1 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released the first release candidate of CloudNativePG 1.24. Help us test new features in preview like distributed PostgreSQL topologies, managed services, enhanced API for synchronous replication, and WAL disk space safeguards.

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.23.3 and 1.22.5 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released a new update for the supported 1.23 and 1.22 versions of the CloudNativePG operator. Version 1.22 has reached End-of-Life (EOL).

item.title: CloudNativePG 1.23.2, 1.22.4 and 1.21.6 Released!
item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released a new update for the supported 1.23, 1.22 and 1.21 versions of the CloudNativePG operator. Version 1.21 has reached End-of-Life (EOL).

item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released the new 1.23 minor version and a new update for the supported 1.22 and 1.21 versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released a new update for the supported 1.22 and 1.21 versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released a new update for the supported 1.22, 1.21 and 1.20 versions of the CloudNativePG operator. Version 1.20 has reached End-of-Life (EOL).

item.description: The CloudNativePG community has released the new 1.22 minor version and a new update for the supported 1.21 and 1.20 versions of the CloudNativePG operator.

item.title: How to test PostgreSQL 16 beta in your Kubernetes cluster
item.description: Participate in the PostgreSQL 16 beta program using Kubernetes and our CloudNativePG operator

item.title: Running PostgreSQL the Kubernetes Way
item.description: Welcome CloudNativePG as a new open source operator that orchestrates PostgreSQL clusters inside Kubernetes!
